```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(gt)
library(scales)

df <- read_csv("pl_table_current_season.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)

df |>
  select(-team_id) |>
  mutate(
    field_tilt = percent(field_tilt, accuracy = 0.1),
    shot_share = percent(shot_share, accuracy = 0.1)
  ) |>
  gt() |>
  cols_label(
    team_name = "Team",
    games_played = "P",
    games_won = "W",
    games_drawn = "D",
    games_lost = "L",
    points = "Pts",
    goals_for = "GF",
    goals_against = "GA",
    goal_difference = "GD",
    xg_for = "xG",
    xg_against = "xGA",
    xg_diff = "xGD",
    xg_open_play_diff = "xGD (OP)",
    xg_set_play_diff = "xGD (SP)",
    xg_non_penalty_diff = "xGD (NP)",
    field_tilt = "Field tilt",
    shot_share = "Shot share"
  ) |>
  fmt_number(
    columns = c(xg_for, xg_against, xg_diff, xg_open_play_diff, xg_set_play_diff, xg_non_penalty_diff),
    decimals = 2
  ) |>
  tab_options(
    table.font.size = px(14),
    data_row.padding = px(3)
  )
```
